Name: AirFar100m
Notes: Decorative atmosphere that is meant to be placed around a planet or section. Unlike other Air objects, this has a far clipping range of 100 meters.

Obj_arg1.Name: Hide during Intro?
Obj_arg1.Description: The air won't appear during the intro if enabled.

SW_B.Description: Disappears if activated, reappears if deactivated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene. Appears if 消滅 action gets triggered.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
